post.body: awesomeness, my love for her just grew 10 fold lol
i love alliteration on x-mas day :) Thanks for everything!
droool. btw- hella people failed 2.005, but im not one of them =/
tell me all about the goodies you got ;)
missing you & B - next yr we shall revive our NYC Thanksgiving tradition :D
tendonitis is going around... I know at least 2 other ppl :(
i opt for new car, burnt panera bagels... or lead :)
that article so made me crack up :)
Packing up for hot (but rainy!) Kauai :D
OMG I want the new Hello Kitty DS game :D & I hate air travel. period.
at a loss to describe how awesome this weekend was. Pillow talks >>> Sleep :D
shopping hiiiigh :D tallying up the damage...
Mmm.. Mint Mojito gum. Good one Orbitz.
I blame Lily for getting me on this :(
